title: Is anybody having trouble logging in?

replies.body:
NA experienced a live service incident on 8/2/2016 that began shortly after 9:00PM PDT and was resolved later in the evening before the scheduled maintenance. This incident affected login and connecting to matches and could have been what you were experiencing before you posted this. 

If you're still experiencing issues logging in, please let me know.

Yeah... I cannot seem to log in, I got in last night for like 20 minutes, long enough to buy RP lol...then game crashed, and was hanging after the authentication on my password..spins for a minute, then gives me some text about not being able to connect
